attributes.action: Prevent the BBC from withdrawing funds from BBC Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC claims that there is very little talent to be found in Scotland and has therefore announced less funding for the Scottish branch. Considering that the BBC recognizes the programme "Two Pints of Larger & A Packet Of Crisps" as the cream of British talent is a complete farce. There is talent in Scotland but the BBC doesn't give us a chance. GIVE US THE MONEY & WE'LL GIVE YOU THE TALENT!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
